obligation_description: Maintain governance arrangements for oversight of cyber  technology  and operational resilience risks.
source_reference_examples: DORA Art.17; MAS TRM Ch.3; PRA SS1/21

obligation_description: Define and maintain clear roles responsibilities and accountability for security and resilience activities.
Maintain a structured process for assessing security and resilience risks.
Perform scenario exercises covering severe but plausible disruptions.
Notify relevant authorities of significant incidents within required timeframes.
Maintain continuity arrangements to support core services during disruptions.
Maintain oversight and monitoring of privileged access usage.
Maintain an inventory of technology assets supporting key services.
Ensure appropriate measures exist for protecting sensitive or critical data.
Apply appropriate technical and organisational measures to preserve confidentiality integrity and availability of personal data.
